name: Floors (itch)
description: You play as determined cube struggling his way to get to the next floor in this endlessrunner-esque puzzle game. ABSOLUTLEY CUBEEE your way through the obstacles as you reach for ever and ever high scores. Keep track of your stats and earn tons of achievements. Watch as your cube goes from lame to CUBETASTIC as you purchase the hundreds of unlockable cube skins, all of which are purchasable with in-game currency. So get out there and experience the CUBETASTIC fun that is Floors.
